column2: Spirit of British Columbia
We pride ourselves in our open, tolerant, and welcoming society. This may explain our high number of migrants.
Spirit of the Canadian Prairies
We have a long history of rebelliousness against the status quo and the elites that seek to exploit our mineral resources without giving us our due share.
Spirit of the Canadian Maritimes
A legacy of trade and bountiful natural resources has charted our destiny to this day.
Spirit of Newfoundland
We have a proud seafaring tradition that remains strong even today.
Spirit of the Northwest Territories
The Northwest Territories has a longstanding history of consensus government, reducing the influence of mass party politics.
Spirit of Ontario
Ontario is proud to be the manufacturing powerhouse of Canada.
Spirit of Quebec
We have not faltered in our commitment to science and education, and we are a major technological hub in the Americas.
Spirit of Alaska
We have ample experience working in the harsh climates and rugged conditions of the North, and we have an easier time extracting resources.
Spirit of Western Canada
Our fertile soils and rich mineral deposits are linked with the nascent Western industries.
Spirit of Eastern Canada
Our strength lies in our diversity and mighty industrial output.
Spirit of Canada
Canada has been reunited under a single banner. Our political, diplomatic, and economic might reverberates across the globe!
